starting: Who would you love to date, to give your all, if only you could figure out a good way to ... whatever people do to start dating?
Which one of the staff has already filed an HR complaint after your correct, but irreverent, nay, scathing contrarianism?
Which one of the staff do you have dirt on? How might they be exploited for your advantage?
Whose romantic advances have you ruined with brutal honesty and tactless criticism?
Most folks don't have the Favors to spend on social gatherings; how did you use your creativity to bring joy to your friends?
Who is a pleasant distraction from your thoughts? Why can't you work up the courage to ask them out?
Whose romantic advances have you ruined with your stubborn willful ignorance of feelings?
horizon: You hacked into some stolen corporate tech and it resulted in a close friend getting injured. Who?

starting: Who would you love to date, if only they took romance as seriously as you do?
Who else knows about the secret network of informants you've set up throughout Cytech?
horizon: What's the name of your group of loyal lackeys?
Whose romantic advances have you spurned because they weren't putting in as much to the relationship as you?

starting: Who would you love to date, if only you could find the right opportunity for your grand gesture of affection?
Which staff member have you so chronically debated that they become irritated with you on sight? What's the moment you think they realized you're right?
horizon: Who have you inspired with your relentless wit and sharp mind for revolutionary rhetoric?
Whose romantic advances have you ruined because they couldn't keep up with your constant need for growth and novelty?

starting: Who do you have a deep romantic, or even spiritual connection with? What's stopping you from dating each other?
Whose romantic advances have you spurned because they don't share your core values?
horizon: Whose life have you saved by stepping in and taking the punishment for them?

Your indominable dedication to your principles and peers has resulted in years of horrible treatment. How has this scarred you? Through this ordeal, you've turned the heart of a corpo bount. Who are they?

starting: Who would you love to date despite all of their superficial flaws? Why are they your soul-mate?
Which one of the corps threatens your best friend in order to get you to be an informant?
horizon: Who is your best friend? Someone you've inspired with grand visions of the future and who you've always helped out of bad spots?
Who broke your heart because dating them wasn't everything you'd imagined it would be?

starting: Who rejected you after what seemed to them as a sudden declaration of your love?
horizon: Who's the one who got away? Where are they now, and what's your plan to win them back?
When your community leader passed away, who advocated for you to take their place? How is filling their shoes going?
Which one of the corps poisoned food meant for you, resulting in the death of one of your loved ones? Who?

starting: Your dreams are vivid, almost ... real? What do you do in your dreams, where you can't be monitored?
horizon: Who's your ex who you would love to date again? Why does it seem like too much work?
Which one of the corps watches your each and every move, punishing you immediately if you so much as toe the line of the box they've defined for you?
Who did you break up with after an intense honeymoon phase because the flames of romance started to flicker?

starting: Who do you have feelings for, who just makes sense for you? How long have you been waiting for them to make a move?
Who broke up with you despite you being the one who won every argument?
horizon: Which one of the corps noticed how hard you worked and then doubled your workload because of it?
You've attended a meeting of a corp's top executives. What have you learned that could help ruin their plans?

starting: Who do you have a crush on; who you jump to the defense of, even when it doesn't make sense? Why haven't you expressed your feelings?
Who broke up with you because you never let them fight their own battles?
horizon: You've been giving up pieces of your body to make rent. What toll has this taken on you?
Which one of the dynastic family scions loves tormenting you, beating you, watching you suffer as you quietly work in order to support your family?

starting: Who do you see at social gatherings who really interests you? What position do you need to be in before you know they'd go out with you?
Who broke up with you because you're incapable of having your mind changed?
horizon: Which one of the corps has abducted you to conduct foul experiments? What scars has their tampering left?
Many of these years you have shut out the woes of the world and focused wholeheartedly on yourself. What special skill have you honed in this time?

starting: Who did you break up with because they never gave you the approval you need, even when you changed yourself for them?
horizon: You have a treasure trove of old movies and books about heroes of the past. Who are they?
Someone is always there for you, reassuring you when you doubt yourself and supporting you through hard times. Who are they? How do you plan to win their heart?
You and your shiftmates have worked together in secret for years to build a secret passage into a corpo building. What's in the room?

starting: Who is the latest flame to catch your eye? What's your novel plan to initiate love?
Which one of the staff gets a little too close? Breathes down your neck? Is visible from the corner of your eye whenever you check?
Who did you break up with because they wanted to get serious too quickly?
horizon: Who is your mentor? A fellow tinkerer who has helped you learn the multitude of your interests?

starting: Who do you delight in surprising in little ways? Why haven't they asked you out yet?
Which one of the staff takes delight in working to control you? To break you down so you don't even attempt small acts of defiance?
You've been working on a passion project, some form of creativity and insight to express your bold ideas and speak to your fellows' hearts. What is it?
Who did you mutually break up with due to their pushiness and your guarded emotions?
Who would you love to introduce to all of your hobbies? To explore and have fun with?
You've been using your large social circle to spread rumors amongst the company. What are the rumors and how will they work to your crew's advantage?
horizon: Who is your partner in crime? Your confidant and close friend who you adventure with?
Who broke up with you because they were looking for something not just fun, but deeper?

starting: Sometimes when you dream, you make contact with someone else in a very real way. Who are they?
Who excites you? Makes you full of energy with just their presence? What's stopping you?
Which one of the staff takes time to sabotage or outright ruin your clothing and appearance?
Who did you break up with because they criticized you and just killed the spark?
